Translated from the back of the DVD case:

"YOUNG LOVE is a warm story about a young boy's first love, friendship and coming of age.

Jukka is a 13-year old boy who wants to protect a 19-year old girl living in a neighboring house from his violent stepfather. The girl, Johanna, wants to become a model and photographs taken by Jukka help her to get into a modeling competition. Jukka falls in love with Johanna but is rejected as too young and inexperienced...

YOUNG LOVE tells about the first steps of love that also cause pain. It is a story of finding the adult world through the eyes of a teenager."

The DVD features 5.1 audio, a making of -documentary, deleted scenes with comments by the director, a music video (Aika - Hear Me Now), introduction of the filmmakers, the trailer for the film and subtitles in english, swedish and finnish for the hearing impaired. The Finnish Board of film recommends the movie for viewers of 11 of age or older.

The torrent includes an ISO image of the DVD and a MDS file, created with DVD Decrypter. Comments are welcome.
